attributes.action: Recognize that students should be able to vote on whom their Headteacher is, within reason.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Headteachers are usually chosen by a council- but shouldn't the students decide who is going to rule over their school. Within reason, but we think students should get the choice.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
